stations.name: Celestia Radio
stations.desc: 'All pony, all the time!', an online streaming radio station that specializes in pony based music and live programming. So stop clopping and turn it up!

stations.name: Alicorn Radio
stations.desc: A Brony Podcast talking about Brony stuff and the show we all enjoy... read fanfics, play games, talk about news, Rage about stuff and have every pony as best pony.

stations.name: Fillydelphia Radio
stations.desc: The Best of Variety Brony Music from across the fandom! Tune in at our website!

stations.name: BronyTunes Radio
stations.desc: The brony music app, made just for bronies. (twitter.com/BronyTunes)

stations.name: Radio Brony
stations.desc: The only French internet radio station that broadcasts music and shows inspired by the My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic TV series 24/7.

stations.name: Absolute Radio
stations.desc: A British National radio station owned and operated by Bauer as part of the Absolute Radio Network.

stations.name: Greatest Hits Radio
stations.desc: The biggest songs of the 70s, 80s and 90s and the home of the Simon Mayo Drivetime Show, Mark Goodier, Paul Gambaccini, Jackie Brambles, Pat Sharp and more.
